showScoreExcerpt:

However, the score is transporting and the sound of the big band/swing era is exhilarating...With 'Bandstand' you may feel youâ€™ve seen this plot before, but who cares? Among the swing music, vitality, sound, Ms. Osnes and Mr. Cott, it is an evening of sheer delight."
